name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David C. ROUSE, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David C. ROUSE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Daniel M. Preminger, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Mark S. Gurevitz, Asst. District Atty., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1012
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David C. ROUSE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 26, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
Daniel M. Preminger, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Mark S. Gurevitz, Asst. District Atty., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
